title: Interpretation of a dream about a man kneading dough in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a man kneading dough in a dream. You want to know the interpretations of scholars about the interpretation of a dream of a man kneading dough in a dream. We present all this and more details that interest you..Interpretation of a dream of a man kneading dough in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a man kneading dough in a dream could be a sign of benefit, and God knows best. The unseen: If the dreamer sees a man kneading dough, this may lead to the benefit he obtains, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When the dreamer sees a person kneading dough, this may indicate getting rid of problems and reconciliation, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees in a dream a person kneading dough, perhaps this symbolizes peace, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a man washing clothes in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a man washing clothes in a dream could be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. Seeing a person performing ablution may indicate abandoning worries, and God knows the unseen. When a married man sees a man performing ablution, it may relieve him of anxiety, and God knows best. The Most High and Most Knowing: If a married woman sees someone performing ablution in a dream, this may be a sign of sustenance, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man urinating in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man urinating in a dream could be a sign of kindness and sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married man sees someone urinating, he may It indicates food, and God knows best. However, if the dreamer sees a man urinating on him, he may be motivated by money, but he spends it on useless things, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone blowing up in a dream. Interpretation of a dream where a person blows himself up in a dream could be a sign of injustice. Himself and that God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a person blowing himself up in a dream, this may be evidence of his bad behavior towards himself and those around him, and God knows best. If a married man sees someone blowing himself up in a dream, this may be evidence of his injustice, and God knows the unseen. If A young man saw terrorism in a dream. This may be a sign of anxiety, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man falling from the sky in a dream. Interpretation of dreams. Seeing a man falling from the sky in a dream could be a sign of a lesson and admonition. It may also indicate that the dreamer is warning against bad deeds, and God knows best. If he sees The dreamer himself falls from the sky in a dream, so this may be evidence that he has forgotten the afterlife, and God knows the unseen. As it can indicate dealing with the world, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream when you see someone hanging in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of seeing someone hanging in a dream, it could be an indication However, a person makes worldly matters difficult for himself and those around him, and God knows the unseen. When you see a person hanging himself in a dream, this may indicate his cruelty towards himself, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees a person hanged, this may lead to his cruelty to herself, and God knows the unseen. While on the gallows It may indicate freedom from the responsibilities of life, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about helping a blind man in a dream. title: Interpretation of the symbol of urine in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: In the following article, we explain to you what is the interpretation of the symbol of urine in a dream, according to what Imam Nabulsi indicated. Urine is the fluid that comes out of the body and helps it get rid of all the toxins. He does not know what it means and wants to know the meaning of this dream and whether it refers to something specific or just thoughts from the subconscious for which there is no explanation. A detailed interpretation of this dream for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman, so follow us. Interpretation of the symbol of urine in a dream. Interpretation of urine in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is urinating in a place he does not know, then this is a vision that indicates his marriage in the coming period. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is urinating in A well, then this is a good vision that shows the lawful money that he will spend. And if the dreamer urinates on a commodity in his dream, then this is an unpleasant vision and indicates the loss that the dreamer will suffer in the coming days. Seeing frequent urination in a dream indicates the removal of worries and relief from distress, and if the dreamer is suffering From poverty, this is good news to get rid of distress, and this dream also indicates the arrival of abundant and blessed. Sustenance in the life of the dreamer. But if a rich person sees in his dream that he urinates a lot, then this is an unpleasant vision that indicates the loss of money. If the sleeper dreams that he cannot urinate, this indicates that he is in a hurry to make a decision. Seeing clay urinating in a dream means Improper ablution. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is urinating, and it smells strange, then this is a vision that indicates the emergence of problems in his life. And the dream of drinking urine indicates forbidden money that the dreamer will obtain. Interpretation of urine in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation scholars say that seeing an unmarried girl urinating on A bed in a dream portends that she will get married soon. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is urinating in public, this is a good vision that indicates that she will get a lot of money in the near future. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is urinating in an unknown place, this is a vision that indicates That she will hear good news in the coming period, and it also indicates happy events. Seeing a shopping center in a dream indicates problems that the dreamer will face in the coming period. If an unmarried girl sees that there is a person urinating in front of her in her dream, this is a vision that indicates that she will extend a hand. Help and help a person who is suffering from accumulating debt. Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that seeing herself urinating in the toilet in a rich, unmarried girl’s dream is an unpleasant dream, indicating loss of money or loss of a job, but if she is suffering from poverty, this is a good vision. . Which heralds the arrival of money. Interpretation of a dream of urinating in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a husband urinating in a married woman’s dream portends pregnancy soon. Seeing urinating in a married woman’s dream is a good dream that indicates the end of the problems and disagreements that she is suffering from. But if a married woman sees in her dream that she is urinating In front of others, this is a vision that indicates the scandal that she will be exposed to. Imam Al-Nabulsi says: If a married woman sees in her dream that she

title: I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy and I was in the third month of pregnancy

preview.html: I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy and I was in the third month of pregnancy. I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy while I was pregnant, so what does this mean? In fact, the dream of a married woman who wants to give birth to a boy or a pregnant woman comes to her dream that she has given birth to a man with great hope that this will be reflected in reality, while this dream can be a kind of inconvenience and surprise for an unmarried woman, and in any case whoever saw such a dream He searches for its explanation and what it hides. In this article through the site Various, we will discuss in detail that I dreamed that I gave birth to a child while I was pregnant. I dreamed that I gave birth to a child while I was pregnant, so what does this mean? Seeing the birth of a child in a dream, according to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, indicates growth and profit. Whoever sees in a dream that he has many children, this means that they will be Beneficial to them: Whoever sees that he has a young son, he will be blessed with a son who has strength, support, and strength. As for Ibn Shaheen, seeing the birth of a child in a dream shows that there is great anxiety in the fortuneteller, and he spoke about it with hateful interpretations, because this dream may indicate the death of the monarch. Seeing a woman A pregnant woman giving birth to a boy in a dream means that in reality she will give birth to a child. Seeing a married woman giving birth to a boy in a dream in a dream means that there is anxiety on the part of the dreamer, but he cuts it off and obtains solace. If there is something related to honor in this dream, it means fear of the death of the fetus. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to an unmarried boy. If she sees For an unmarried girl in a dream that she is giving birth, this is a good vision because it means the beginning of a new life or adopting a new person in her life and this may mean that she is close to engagement or marriage and giving birth means happy opportunities. If she sees that she has given birth to a beautiful boy, her husband will be good and have good morals. If the boy looks ugly This means that the husband is of bad character, but if he sees that he gave birth to a sick child, this means that the husband is wrong. If she sees that she gives birth to a stillborn fetus or it dies in her womb, this indicates a husband who is famous for being immoral and the cause of her sadness and unhappiness, and it may also mean that she will face problems. If A married woman sees that she is giving birth in a dream and is not pregnant, which means that she is suffering from problems in her life, but she will quickly get rid of them and live a new stage that is better than the previous one. A. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a non-pregnant child. If a married woman is suffering from labor and sees in a dream that she is giving birth, then this is good news about the pregnancy. If the birth was difficult, this means good news after a long patience. If she sees that she has given birth and the fetus has died, this means that she is barren and will not give birth, whether a mother or father was born before her. He was not born. It may mean the death of a member of her family, her husband, her father, or her brother, and God knows best. If he sees that she is giving birth to a strange child, this indicates a new stage in her life, but he is worried. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a boy in a pregnancy dreamInterpretation of a dream about giving birth to a handsome boy for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is giving birth to a handsome boy, this means that she will actually give birth. If She sees that she has given birth to a female, she will give birth to a male. If a woman sees in a dream that she is pregnant in reality with a man, then this boy will have a special feminine beauty. If a woman sees a male

title: Interpretation of seeing a request for divorce in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a request for divorce in a dream or a dream through the vision website Roy2a.com by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. The two parts lead to the disintegration and destruction of the entire family, so we will talk through this article about the interpretation of this vision for the unmarried girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the man, and the young man. What is the interpretation of seeing a request for divorce in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a single girl requesting a divorce in a dream Frequent quarrels between spouses is a sign of strength Love and security between them. Seeing a single girl asking for a divorce in a dream indicates the opening of the doors of sustenance and abundant kindness for the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of seeing marriage suddenly and without consent and requesting a divorce in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a request for divorce in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman asking for divorce in a dream. Indicating many differences. Between the two sides, they reached a great understanding and their struggle together to secure their future. Seeing a married woman divorcing her husband in a dream indicates providing livelihood for her and her husband. See also: Interpretation of divorce in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a divorced woman asking for a divorce in a dream: Seeing a divorced woman asking for a divorce in a dream with her feeling of sadness is a sign It brings her goodness and blessings. Seeing an absolute dream in a dream that separates her from someone indicates that the doors of kindness and livelihood will be opened for her without effort. What is the interpretation of seeing a request for divorce in a dream for a man: Seeing a man divorcing his wife and she feels sad is an indication of the abundance of blessings in his life and opening the door to great livelihood. For him. A man sees a couple arguing together and the many differences between them indicate God’s satisfaction with him and brings goodness to him. See also: The interpretation of seeing my sister’s ex-wife in a dream. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees divorce in a dream: Seeing a pregnant woman arguing a lot with her husband and divorcing him is evidence that it brings them Kindness and poor. A pregnant woman sees her husband quarreling with him, calms her down, then divorces him. It indicates God’s compensation for her and her children and her great success in life. What is the interpretation of seeing a young man asking for a divorce in a dream: Seeing a young man asking for a divorce in a dream and her extreme sadness is evidence of many blessings and good things in his life. Seeing a young man asking for a divorce in a dream. The divorce of his sister and his intense sadness over her is an indication that it brings him and his sister a lot of goodness and stability in their lives. See also: Interpretation of seeing my ex-wife in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a request for divorce in a dream: Seeing a request for divorce in a dream from the husband The feeling of sadness and despair is an indication of the dreamer’s struggle and effort to obtain Good and abundant food. Seeing a man divorcing his wife in a dream and her strong rejection is a sign of acquiring enormous wealth after a long journey of struggle. What is the interpretation of seeing divorce in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing divorce in a dream by Ibn Shaheen indicates many marital problems and disputes between the two parties. Vision A man divorcing his wife with three divorces in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate the end of all disputes and problems and the stability of life between them. See also: Interpretation of seeing a quarrel with a husband or wife in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing divorce in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing divorce in a dream by Ibn Sirin

title: Interpretation of seeing wood by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing wood in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the meaning of chopping wood. Dreaming of wood shows hatred and hypocrisy, and from the visions many people search for some explanations for them, as the visions are sometimes annoying and sometimes they have benign interpretations and sometimes they have bad interpretations on this subject through Lines In the following article, we will learn in detail the interpretation of wood in a dream. Interpretation of seeing wood by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing wood by Ibn Sirin, which highlighted the following: Dreaming of wood indicates the presence of feelings of hypocrisy and hatred. If one sees that wood is being cut down in a dream, it means that this person He will triumph over his enemies. Seeing wood and the dreamer connected to it in a dream means that this person is able to arrange his priorities in addition to organizing his life. If someone dreams that he is carrying firewood, this indicates that he feels psychological comfort and that his luck accompanies him. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation A dream about wood for NabulsiInterpretation of a dream about wood for Nabulsi: If one sees that there is a pile of wood in the dream, this indicates that there is love between the dreamer and everyone around him. If a person dreams of soft wood, this means that the dreamer is an intelligent person who knows how to deal with Others. The interpretation of seeing a person sawing wood and shaping it in a dream indicates that he is a hardworking, tired person who seeks to achieve all his ambitions. The elements of diligence, fatigue and effort for success at work. Carved wood in a person’s dream indicates his failure and his feeling of sadness and anxiety. If a person sees wood and it is dry, This indicates many benefits and advantages that will accrue to the dreamer. If a person sees this dream and then goes to agricultural land to cut it, this indicates the spread of unrest. A dream about wood indicates abundant livelihood and access to a sum of money. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation Dreams of seeing wood for single women: If an unmarried girl sees herself holding a stick, this indicates that someone will propose to her and she will be a kind and generous person and that she is a good girl. Seeing firewood in an unmarried girl’s dream is interpreted as meaning that she will be able to succeed and win at work and that she will be able To fulfill all her desires. It interprets seeing wood for an unmarried girl on the day of engagement and the day of approaching marriage. Seeing wet wood in a single woman’s dream indicates that her affairs are easy and that there is good news on her way. See also: Backgrounds in a dream Interpretation of a dream about wood for a married woman If A married woman saw this dream, it is a good vision that indicates goodness and that her life will be good. A dream of white wood in a dream for a married woman indicates that there will be some happy news coming for this lady, whether it is promoting the husband at work or indicating the success of her children. If she sees A married woman sees red wood in her dream, this indicates the presence of strife with some family disputes and problems. Dreaming of wood and the color black indicates that this girl will receive some bad news and that one of the family members will die. See also: H

If a person dreams of soft wood, this means that the dreamer is an intelligent person who knows how to deal with Others. The interpretation of seeing a person sawing wood and shaping it in a dream indicates that he is a hardworking, tired person who seeks to achieve all his ambitions. The elements of diligence, fatigue and effort for success at work. Carved wood in a person’s dream indicates his failure and his feeling of sadness and anxiety. If a person sees wood and it is dry, This indicates many benefits and advantages that will accrue to the dreamer. If a person sees this dream and then goes to agricultural land to cut it, this indicates the spread of unrest. A dream about wood indicates abundant livelihood and access to a sum of money. Interpretation Dreams of seeing wood for single women: If an unmarried girl sees herself holding a stick, this indicates that someone will propose to her and she will be a kind and generous person and that she is a good girl. Seeing firewood in an unmarried girl’s dream is interpreted as meaning that she will be able to succeed and win at work and that she will be able To fulfill all her desires. It interprets seeing wood for an unmarried girl on the day of engagement and the day of approaching marriage. Seeing wet wood in a single woman’s dream indicates that her affairs are easy and that there is good news on her way. title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a falcon in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing a falcon in a dream: A falcon in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate many connections that differ in their interpretation between good and evil. The vision and its interpretations vary according to the type of dreamer, whether he is a man, a woman, a girl, or a divorced woman, and the condition of each person during sleep, and in this The article will explain in detail all of these explanations. What does a falcon mean in a dream? Seeing a falcon in a dream mostly symbolizes good, pleasant and happy news that the dreamer will hear soon, God willing. Seeing a falcon in a dream means abundance of money and a huge livelihood that the person will receive. When One sees a falcon in a dream, this is evidence of the improvement of one’s health and recovery from any illness that he suffered from in the past. Also, seeing a falcon in a dream indicates the achievement of long-awaited goals. Seeing a falcon in a dream indicates the emergence of the truth and the removal of injustice from a person if he He is suffering from a crisis in his life. The vision also indicates the status, power, and high status that the dreamer enjoys near him, God willing. A falcon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a falcon in a dream is a sign of goodness and blessing that the dreamer will soon attain, God willing. Also, seeing a falcon In a dream, it means good news that a person will hear soon. Seeing a falcon in a dream indicates the stability of the dreamer’s affairs, his success in the coming period, and the achievement of many goals that he sought to achieve in the past. Also, a righteous man who sees a falcon in a dream indicates the high position he enjoys and that he A person of good character and religion. Seeing a falcon in a dream shows the strength, courage, and good qualities that he possesses. What is the interpretation of seeing a falcon in one dream? Seeing a falcon in an unmarried woman’s dream means good and pleasant news that she will hear soon, God willing. A girl who sees a falcon in a dream It is a sign that she will soon marry a young man with good morals and religion, and that their life will be stable and beautiful, God willing. To see a falcon in an unmarried woman’s dream means a high status and success that you will achieve soon, God willing. A girl who watches a falcon in a dream is a sign of achieving the goals that she She has been striving for it for a long time. If a girl sees a hawk in a dream but it is weak and unable to fly, this is a sign of laziness and loss of the ability to adapt to the environment. What is the interpretation of a dream about a hawk for a married woman? Seeing a hawk in a married woman’s dream symbolizes The stable life she enjoys with her husband and that she is very happy with him, thank God. Also, a married woman’s dream of a falcon indicates a high status and an abundance of goodness that will soon come to her husband, God willing. A married woman who sees a falcon in a dream is a sign that she will get rid of the problems that have plagued her. With her life for a long time. A married woman who sees a falcon in a dream is an indication that she will give birth soon, and it will be a boy, and God knows best. A married woman’s dream of a falcon indicates that her children are excelling in their studies and will reach the

title: Interpretation of iron in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its meaning is the correct and comprehensive interpretation

preview.html: Learn in this article from the encyclopedia about the interpretation of iron in a dream in detail. Iron is considered one of the most important metals used in many industries, including the manufacture of iron wires. It is the only metal that is mentioned in the Holy Qur’an in Surat Sheba (ۖAnd it has iron). There is an entire Surah named after this mineral in the Holy Quran. In fact, iron is one of the strongest and hardest metals. As for vision in the world of dreams, it is one of the mysterious symbols whose interpretations we must know. What did the dream interpreters say about the meaning of this dream? We will show you this in the following lines. Interpretation of iron in a dream by Ibn Sirin The interpreter of dreams, Ibn Sirin, continued to interpret this dream as a sign of the dreamer’s greatness, strength and abundance of goodness. When the dreamer dreams of a house made of iron, the interpretation of this lies in providing blessings in the dreamer’s life When the dreamer sees that he is living inside a house made of iron, the meaning of this dream lies in the fact that the dreamer is suffering from the loss of his freedom in reality. If you see a broken iron in a dream, this is an undesirable sign as it indicates that the dreamer will be harmed. When he dreams The dreamer works in the iron trade and shapes iron in a dream. This dream is good news for him in obtaining a high position in reality, and God knows best. But if the dreamer sees that he collides with iron in the fire, but is damaged because of it, then this is an undesirable interpretation, because it indicates crises. Which the dreamer faces in reality. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating iron, then the meaning of this dream lies in the dreamer’s strength and determination to bear the responsibilities and burdens that fall on his shoulders. If the dreamer sees that his feet are made of iron, this expresses the dreamer’s determination and strength to commit. With its principles in reality. When the dreamer dreams of melting iron in a dream, this dream expresses the extent of his diligence in his professional life. Seeing iron being sold in a dream means that the dreamer will give up his profession if he is in a high position. As for buying iron in a dream, it is a sign of bad morals. The dreamer and his falling into sins and disobedience represented by bribery. If the dreamer sees in a dream that his hands are made of iron, the meaning of this dream shows the dreamer’s bad morals and his rejection of others. When you see iron descending from the sky, the interpretation of this dream is that the dreamer is going through many crises in Reality. Swallowing iron in a dream: If the dreamer sees himself swallowing a piece of iron, this interpretation symbolizes how patient the dreamer is with the difficulties he faces in his life. As for the hateful interpretation of eating iron in a dream, it indicates that the dreamer speaks badly about others, in addition to passing With a financial crisis. As for the meaning of swallowing iron in a dream for a married woman, it indicates the extent to which she tolerates her husband’s mistakes. Interpretation of seeing an iron skewer in a dream: Dream interpreter Ibn Shaheen explained that seeing an iron skewer in a dream is one of the unexpected visions, as it expresses the emergence of disagreements between the dreamer and his family members. And God knows best. If you see meat being grilled on a stove

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the news of the death of a living person. Interpretation of dreams to hear the news of the death of a living person. If you dream that you are crying for a living person and she died in the dream, then this dream indicates more sustenance and salvation soon. If you see the death of a living person in your dream it means that if he is sick he will recover and if he is alive his life will increase. The death of a living person in a dream indicates longevity, health, and recovery for the dreamer and others. You can follow an article about the interpretation of a dream about the news of the death of a living person through: Otherwise, the interpretation of hearing the news of the death of a living person for one person. The interpretation of the dream of hearing the news of the death of a living person. If an unmarried woman dreams of the death of a member of her family and weeps over it, then this dream indicates that she loves him very much and is afraid that he will be divorced. This person is on her. If an unmarried woman dreams that she sees a stranger die and then comes back to life, this dream indicates that the person will propose to her, but she is poor and will accept and help her until he comes. He succeeds. If someone sees the death of a loved one in a dream and then cries a lot, this dream indicates that this person will regain his health and well-being as soon as possible. Whoever sees in his dream that he heard the news of the death of a living person in reality, the vision indicates that he will soon come to you with a lot of good news. If the dreamer sees that someone who is alive to him is actually dying, then this dream indicates that he will give you new news and get rid of problems and quarrels.Whoever sees someone alive in his dream and who dies in his dream indicates that the Almighty God will prolong the life of that person. Death in a dream indicates longevity, peace of mind, recovery, and enjoyment of good health in reality, God willing. If you see in your dream the death of a relative, this dream indicates that an event will happen soon and it will be a happy event. So. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is ignoring God and crying over him, this may indicate that Almighty God will prolong his life. Perhaps the death of a living person in a married woman’s dream portends the birth of a boy soon, God willing. Death in a dream is the end of an old event and the beginning of a new one, and it can be negative or positive depending on the feelings of the person in the dream. Death in a dream is one of the positive interpretations that indicate marriage, engagement, graduation, or entry into a new job, and the interpretation of death changes according to what he sees. The dreamer in his dream. A negative interpretation of death in a dream is seeing the deceased actually dying again, because this reflects completely different feelings and dissatisfaction with this person. Whoever sees himself being killed, bathing, and hiding in a dream, this indicates that he is not righteous in his religion, and this is a warning from God Almighty to him. title: What is the interpretation of teeth falling out in a dream?

preview.html: Teeth falling out in a dream. Many believe that seeing one’s teeth falling out in a dream harms evil and rushes to search for an interpretation of the dream. Teeth falling out in a dream. But the belief is wrong, as the dream brings more good than bad. There are many interpretations for interpreting the dream that teeth are falling out. There are many opinions of Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, and Ibn Sirin in interpreting a dream. Teeth falling out and the site will inform us about it. Different apart from the vision of married and single women for a dream. The opinion of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi on teeth falling out in a dream. Ibn Sirin explained that teeth falling out in a dream does not bode well for the dreamer. While Al-Nabulsi is one of the interpreters of dreams and visions, he It is believed that if a dreamer dreams of one of his teeth falling out, the interpretation of the dream is better for the dreamer because it interprets that God will grant him a long life. Al-Nabulsi explained that the dreamer will stay away from his family and loved ones and depending on the condition of the tooth, Al-Nabulsi explained that one of his relatives will die before the dreamer and all the teeth will fall out better except Age. From falling to the ground. Al-Nabulsi explained that if the dreamer found that his teeth suddenly fell without knowing where they fell, then the interpretation of the dream was bad, but if he knew where they fell, the interpretation of the dream was better for him. Interpretation of teeth falling out in a dream with the upper teeth. Ibn Sirin explained that the upper teeth in the dream are from the father’s relatives, and based on it, if the dreamer dreams that all of his teeth in the upper row have fallen out, the interpretation of the dream is that it is bad for him. While if the dreamer dreams of his upper canines falling out, the interpretation of the dream is not interpreted positively, because it is evidence of death and the presence of a disaster that will befall the master of the house or the great-grandfather. Ibn Sirin also explained that if the dreamer saw the upper row of his teeth falling out, the interpretation of the dream was that the dreamer is harmed. With his friends with whom he deals. While Ibn Sirin interpreted the loss of teeth as evidence that the dreamer does not reach his kinship on the father’s side. Evil does not explain all the upper teeth. If the dreamer sees that his teeth have fallen out, the interpretation of the dream is that the dreamer gets a lot of money. If the dreamer dreams that his teeth fall into his lap, then the interpretation of the dream is that the dreamer will give birth to a son from his wife. Ibn Sirin said: A dream about teeth falling out in a dream is good as long as they do not fall to the ground, then it is evidence of evil. Lower teeth falling out in a dream, Ibn Sirin mentions That the lower teeth are the family of the dreamer’s mother, therefore: If the dreamer dreams that all of his lower teeth fell to the ground, the interpretation of the dream does not translate to good for him. It is evidence of the death of one of his mother’s family and bears witness to his death. While Al-Nabulsi said in his interpretation of the falling of the lower teeth that the dreamer will be exposed to falls, worries and misfortunes. While the falling of the tusk from the lower side explains the death of the dreamer’s mother or grandmother. Also, the interpretation of the dreamer’s dream is that his lower teeth fell on the dreamer. It is that the dreamer does things that harm his family among the women of the family or that he does not contact them and breaks his family ties. Mother's family. Interpretation of teeth falling out in a dream. Al-Nabulsi explained that if he dreams

Ibn Sirin explained that teeth falling out in a dream does not bode well for the dreamer. While Al-Nabulsi is one of the interpreters of dreams and visions, he It is believed that if a dreamer dreams of one of his teeth falling out, the interpretation of the dream is better for the dreamer because it interprets that God will grant him a long life. Al-Nabulsi explained that the dreamer will stay away from his family and loved ones and depending on the condition of the tooth, Al-Nabulsi explained that one of his relatives will die before the dreamer and all the teeth will fall out better except Age. From falling to the ground. Al-Nabulsi explained that if the dreamer found that his teeth suddenly fell without knowing where they fell, then the interpretation of the dream was bad, but if he knew where they fell, the interpretation of the dream was better for him. Interpretation of teeth falling out in a dream with the upper teeth. Ibn Sirin explained that the upper teeth in the dream are from the father’s relatives, and based on it, if the dreamer dreams that all of his teeth in the upper row have fallen out, the interpretation of the dream is that it is bad for him. While if the dreamer dreams of his upper canines falling out, the interpretation of the dream is not interpreted positively, because it is evidence of death and the presence of a disaster that will befall the master of the house or the great-grandfather. Ibn Sirin also explained that if the dreamer saw the upper row of his teeth falling out, the interpretation of the dream was that the dreamer is harmed. With his friends with whom he deals. While Ibn Sirin interpreted the loss of teeth as evidence that the dreamer does not reach his kinship on the father’s side. Evil does not explain all the upper teeth. If the dreamer sees that his teeth have fallen out, the interpretation of the dream is that the dreamer gets a lot of money. If the dreamer dreams that his teeth fall into his lap, then the interpretation of the dream is that the dreamer will give birth to a son from his wife. Ibn Sirin said: A dream about teeth falling out in a dream is good as long as they do not fall to the ground, then it is evidence of evil. Lower teeth falling out in a dream, Ibn Sirin mentions That the lower teeth are the family of the dreamer’s mother, therefore: If the dreamer dreams that all of his lower teeth fell to the ground, the interpretation of the dream does not translate to good for him. It is evidence of the death of one of his mother’s family and bears witness to his death. While Al-Nabulsi said in his interpretation of the falling of the lower teeth that the dreamer will be exposed to falls, worries and misfortunes. While the falling of the tusk from the lower side explains the death of the dreamer’s mother or grandmother. Also, the interpretation of the dreamer’s dream is that his lower teeth fell on the dreamer. It is that the dreamer does things that harm his family among the women of the family or that he does not contact them and breaks his family ties. Mother's family.
